Posts.Content: dakotaseas wrote: Iam a mother of 3 , and I am 47 yrs old < i had my children late in life in my 40s >.On Thurs I went for a mamogram and Friday got a call to came back for a mammotome breast biopsy on Monday and on Wedsday I was told I have 2 spots in right breast one is ductal carcinoma  and second is invasive ductal carinoma .My doc had me coming in to take to surg and they sugg a Mastectomy of right breat this was on Wedsday....I asked if waiting a few weeks was to long and well they want my to take my phyical on Monday and get a date in June so needless to say alot to take in ... I am wondering how long I will be in pain ......I know I have alot more questions but I am worried about my family and caring for them .Thank you all   Please dont mind spelling have chemo brain sometimes;-) - Dx 7/5/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 4/27 nodes, mets, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: afraid of pain dakotaseas Elliemae32

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2008 12:05PM dakotaseas wrote: I know its a hard road but it will end mke sure that you phone your doc or chemo nurse they can help with emotions and other side effects.I just finshed my red koolaid now on tax.
